de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui

Class MainApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.Main
      • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.MainApplication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RyCON

    public class MainApplication
extends Main
    This class is the main application of RyCON.

    This class initializes the main window of RyCON and setup the background functionality which is done by the extension of the Main class.

    Since:
    1
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    sebastian
    See Also:
    Main
